Privacy Policy
Last Updated: December 14, 2024

Welcome to Doctors Scheduling app! This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our doctor scheduling app. By using the app, you agree to the terms outlined below.
Data We Collect
Personal Information: Name, email address, and contact information for account creation and profile management.
Scheduling Data: Details of appointments, doctor schedules, and patient visits.
Usage Data: App usage patterns, crash logs, and performance metrics to improve the app experience.
How We Use Your Data
To manage doctor schedules and appointments.
To improve user experience through app updates and support.
To communicate important notifications about your appointments or app updates.
Data Sharing
We do not sell, trade, or share your personal data with third parties, except:
When required by law or legal processes.
With service providers assisting us in operating the app, bound by confidentiality agreements.
Data Security
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no system is completely secure, so we recommend safeguarding your login credentials.
Your Rights
Access and update your personal information via the app settings.
Request data deletion by contacting support at [Insert Contact Email].
Changes to this Policy
We may update this policy periodically. Any changes will be reflected here, and major changes will be communicated through the app.
Contact Us
For any questions or concerns, contact us at floresjovenrey26@gmail.com.
